channel.title: [PI] Woodcutting Error
channel.description:
Hey all, i followed this guide: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,473125.0.html
The guide was to improve woodcutting, yet i followed it with no errors untill i had to add this
[code]if (wcTimer > 0 && woodcut[0] > 0) wcTimer--;[/code]
Now i get this error:
[code]src\server\model\players\Client.java:106: illegal start of type if (wcTimer > 0 && woodcut[0] > 0) { ^ src\server\model\players\Client.java:106: <identifier> expected if (wcTimer > 0 && woodcut[0] > 0) { ^ src\server\model\players\Client.java:106: ';' expected if (wcTimer > 0 && woodcut[0] > 0) { ^ src\server\model\players\Client.java:106: illegal start of type if (wcTimer > 0 && woodcut[0] > 0) { ^ src\server\model\players\Client.java:106: ']' expected if (wcTimer > 0 && woodcut[0] > 0) { ^ src\server\model\players\Client.java:106: illegal start of type if (wcTimer > 0 && woodcut[0] > 0) { ^ src\server\model\players\Client.java:106: <identifier> expected if (wcTimer > 0 && woodcut[0] > 0) { ^ src\server\model\players\Client.java:106: ';' expected if (wcTimer > 0 && woodcut[0] > 0) { ^ src\server\model\players\Client.java:106: illegal start of type if (wcTimer > 0 && woodcut[0] > 0) { ^ src\server\model\players\Client.java:106: <identifier> expected if (wcTimer > 0 && woodcut[0] > 0) { ^ src\server\model\players\Client.java:106: ';' expected if (wcTimer > 0 && woodcut[0] > 0) { ^ src\server\model\players\Client.java:107: illegal start of type wcTimer--; ^ src\server\model\players\Client.java:107: <identifier> expected wcTimer--; ^ src\server\model\players\Client.java:107: ';' expected wcTimer--; ^ 14 errors Press any key to continue . . .
[/code]
Can anyone help me? Rep++ if you can :)

item.title: [PI] Woodcutting Error
item.dc:creator: @The_Outsider The Outsider
item.description:
@The_Outsider wrote:

if ((wcTimer > 0) && (woodcut[0] > 0)) {

Don’t forget to close the open bracket where it applies.

When you use an if statement it must (95% of the time) follow with open bracket parenthesis “{” and end with a close bracket parenthesis “}”.

If you are using the && operator for two or more arguments you must enclose each argument with the “(” and “)” parenthesis and make sure to use the “(” and “)” parenthesis around the entire argument.

This is so it can read the whole thing as one argument, but with 2 or more separate arguments in between. Okay? I tried to explain that as simple as possible.

It’s the same principle as using a calculator to do multiple sums at once i.e:

(1 + 2 + 3 * 10) = a;

and

(1 + 2) + (3 * 10) = a;

are the same numbers but give a different answer.

//60
//33

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Woodcutting Error
item.dc:creator: @teh_one teh one
item.description:
@teh_one wrote:

Hey all, i followed this guide: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,473125.0.html

The guide was to improve woodcutting, yet i followed it with no errors untill i had to add this

if (wcTimer > 0 && woodcut[0] > 0) wcTimer--;

Now i get this error:

[code]src\server\model\players\Client.java:106: illegal start of type
if (wcTimer > 0 && woodcut[0] > 0) {
^
src\server\model\players\Client.java:106: expected
if (wcTimer > 0 && woodcut[0] > 0) {
^
src\server\model\players\Client.java:106: ‘;’ expected
if (wcTimer > 0 && woodcut[0] > 0) {
^
src\server\model\players\Client.java:106: illegal start of type
if (wcTimer > 0 && woodcut[0] > 0) {
^
src\server\model\players\Client.java:106: ‘]’ expected
if (wcTimer > 0 && woodcut[0] > 0) {
^
src\server\model\players\Client.java:106: illegal start of type
if (wcTimer > 0 && woodcut[0] > 0) {
^
src\server\model\players\Client.java:106: expected
if (wcTimer > 0 && woodcut[0] > 0) {
^
src\server\model\players\Client.java:106: ‘;’ expected
if (wcTimer > 0 && woodcut[0] > 0) {
^
src\server\model\players\Client.java:106: illegal start of type
if (wcTimer > 0 && woodcut[0] > 0) {
^
src\server\model\players\Client.java:106: expected
if (wcTimer > 0 && woodcut[0] > 0) {
^
src\server\model\players\Client.java:106: ‘;’ expected
if (wcTimer > 0 && woodcut[0] > 0) {
^
src\server\model\players\Client.java:107: illegal start of type
wcTimer–;
^
src\server\model\players\Client.java:107: expected
wcTimer–;
^
src\server\model\players\Client.java:107: ‘;’ expected
wcTimer–;
^
14 errors
Press any key to continue . . .

[/code]

Can anyone help me? Rep++ if you can
